verses.verse: And when I <S%G2064>came<s%> to you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I did not <S%G2064>come<s%> with <S%G5247>superiority<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2605>proclaiming<s%> to you the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For I <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and Him <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>
And I was with you in <S%G769>weakness<s%> and in <S%G5401>fear<s%> and in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5156>trembling.<s%>

And my <S%G3056>message<s%> and my <S%G2782>preaching<s%> were not in <S%G3981>persuasive<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> but in <S%G585>demonstration<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and of <S%G1411>power,<s%>
that your <S%G4102>faith<s%> should not <S%G1510>rest<s%> on the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but on the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> we do <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5046>mature;<s%> a <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G1161>however,<s%> not of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> who are <S%G2673>passing<s%> <S%G2673>away;<s%>

but we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> in a <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> the <S%G613>hidden<s%> [wisdom,] <S%G3739>which<s%> God <S%G4309>predestined<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G165>ages<s%> to our <S%G1391>glory;<s%>

[the wisdom] <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age<s%> has <S%G1097>understood;<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> they had <S%G1097>understood<s%> it, they would not have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G1391>glory;<s%>

but <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "Things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> has not <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G3775>ear<s%> has not <S%G191>heard,<s%> And [which] have not <S%G305>entered<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3745>All<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> Him."

For to us <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> [them] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%> for the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2045>searches<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G899>depths<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G5101>who<s%> among <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> the [thoughts] of a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G444>man,<s%> which is in him? <S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the [thoughts] of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we have <S%G2983>received,<s%> not the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is from <S%G2316>God,<s%> that we might <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G5483>things<s%> <S%G5483>freely<s%> <S%G5483>given<s%> to us by <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> things we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2980>speak,<s%> not in <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G1318>taught<s%> by <S%G442>human<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> but in those <S%G1318>taught<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G4793>combining<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> [thoughts] with <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> [words.]

But a <S%G5591>natural<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> does not <S%G1209>accept<s%> the things of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> for they are <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> to him, and he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097>understand<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> <S%G350>appraised.<s%>
But he who is <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G350>appraises<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G350>appraised<s%> by <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man.<s%>

For <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that he should <S%G4822>instruct<s%> Him? But we <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
